Sex.description: The sex of the crab, can be Male (M), Female (F) or Infant (I)

Length.description: The length of the crab (unit is not specified)

Diameter.description: The diameter of the crab (unit is not specified)

Height.description: The height of the crab (unit is not specified)

Weight.description: The overall weight of the crab (unit is not specified)

Shucked Weight.description: The weight of the crab after being shucked (unit is not specified)

Viscera Weight.description: The weight of the viscera of the crab (unit is not specified)

Shell Weight.description: The weight of the shell of the crab (unit is not specified)

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in marine biology.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the physical features of the crab, please predict the age of the crab.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted age of the crab is.
